targets.rawSql:
SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), sum(amount)
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE profile_id in ($profile) and timestamp > $__from::bigint*1000 and status='success' and ops_type in ('pnl', 'funding', 'fee')
GROUP BY timestamp
ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT to_timestamp(archive_timestamp/1e6), market_id, (CASE WHEN side='long' THEN notional ELSE -1*notional END) AS notional 
from app_position where profile_id IN ($profile) and market_id in ($symbol) and archive_timestamp >= (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '48 hour')) * 1000000)::bigint

SELECT
  t1.id AS profile_id, t1.wallet, t1.balance, t1.account_equity, t1.cum_unrealized_pnl AS unrealized_pnl, t1.withdrawable_balance, t1.health, t1.account_leverage, t1.cum_trading_volume,
  t1.total_position_margin, t1.total_order_margin, 
  TO_TIMESTAMP(t1.last_update/1000000::numeric) AS last_update
FROM app_profile_cache_last t1
WHERE t1.id IN ($profile)

SELECT
  t1.market_id,
  t1.profile_id,
  t1.size,
  t1.side,
  t1.entry_price,
  t1.unrealized_pnl,
  (
    CASE
      WHEN t1.side = 'long' THEN t1.notional
      ELSE -1 * t1.notional
    END
  ) as notional,
  t1.margin,
  t1.fair_price,
  t1.liquidation_price,
  to_timestamp(t1.archive_timestamp / 1e6) AS archive_timestamp
FROM app_position_last_archive_timestamp last
JOIN app_position t1 ON t1.market_id = last.market_id AND t1.archive_timestamp = last.archive_timestamp

SELECT
 market_id, 
 SUM(price*size) AS volume
 FROM app_fill
 WHERE profile_id IN ($profile) AND market_id IN ($symbol) AND is_maker=true AND timestamp > $__from::bigint*1000
 GROUP BY rollup(market_id)

SELECT
 market_id, 
 SUM(price*size) AS volume
 FROM app_fill
 WHERE profile_id IN ($profile) AND market_id IN ($symbol) AND is_maker=false AND timestamp > $__from::bigint*1000
 GROUP BY rollup(market_id)

SELECT market_id, count(status), profile_id FROM app_order 
WHERE status = 'open' AND profile_id in ($profile) AND timestamp > $__from::bigint*1000
GROUP BY market_id, profile_id

WITH best_bids AS (
  SELECT market_id, max(price) as best_bid_price FROM app_order 
  WHERE timestamp >= $__from::bigint*1000 AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000 AND market_id IN ($symbol) AND profile_id in ($profile) AND status='open' AND side='long'
  GROUP BY market_id
),
best_asks AS (
  SELECT market_id, min(price) as best_ask_price FROM app_order 
  WHERE timestamp >= $__from::bigint*1000 AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000 AND market_id IN ($symbol) AND profile_id in ($profile) AND status='open' AND side='short'
  GROUP BY market_id
)

SELECT b.market_id,
       b.best_bid_price,
       a.best_ask_price,
       (a.best_ask_price - b.best_bid_price)/(b.best_bid_price/2+a.best_ask_price/2) AS spread
FROM best_bids b
JOIN best_asks a
ON b.market_id = a.market_id
ORDER BY b.market_id;

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, profile_id, price, size, price*size AS notional, side, is_maker, fee, liquidation, order_id, trade_id
 FROM app_fill 
 WHERE profile_id IN ($profile) AND timestamp > $__from::bigint*1000 AND price*size > 10 AND market_id IN ($symbol) AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000
 order by timestamp DESC
 LIMIT 100

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6) as timestamp, market_id, status, price, size, price*size AS notional, side, initial_size, total_filled_size, profile_id, order_type, reason, id FROM app_order 
WHERE timestamp >= $__from::bigint*1000 AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000 AND market_id IN ($symbol) AND profile_id in ($profile) AND status='open' AND side='long'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC, price DESC
LIMIT 50

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, status, price, size, price*size AS notional, side, initial_size, total_filled_size, profile_id, order_type, reason, id FROM app_order 
WHERE timestamp >= $__from::bigint*1000 AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000 AND market_id IN ($symbol) AND profile_id in($profile)  AND status='open' AND side='short'
ORDER BY timestamp DESC, price ASC

SELECT shard_id,ops_type, SUM(amount) 
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE profile_id in ($profile) and status='success'

GROUP BY ROLLUP(ops_type),rollup(shard_id) ORDER BY shard_id, ops_type

SELECT time_bucket('1 day'::interval, to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6)) as day_bucket, 
	sum(amount) AS Amount, 
	shard_id
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE profile_id in ($profile) 
	and ops_type in ('pnl', 'funding', 'fee')
GROUP BY day_bucket, shard_id
ORDER BY day_bucket DESC
